issue.title: [CF 701] Icons not updating after free arena talent swap
issue.body:
Investigate and figure out what the problem is here:

05:14:06 PM: [From] <Zor>: so this is the bug
05:14:28 PM: [From] <Zor>: you know how when in an arena you can change a talent for free, then when you leave it goes back to what it qwas before?
05:14:46 PM: [From] <Zor>: if I enter arena with bladestorm, then change to dragon roar in the arena
05:14:53 PM: [From] <Zor>: when I leave the arena I have bladestorm again
05:15:01 PM: [To] <Zor>: i was not aware that that was a thing
05:15:03 PM: [To] <Zor>: but go on
05:15:06 PM: [From] <Zor>: but my TMW that tracks the CDs of shockwave/bladestorm/roar still shows roar
05:15:19 PM: [From] <Zor>: like it doesnt realize i have bladestorm now
05:16:02 PM: [From] <Zor>: makes me waste a tome every time
05:16:07 PM: [To] <Zor>: or you could just type /tmw twice
05:16:16 PM: [From] <Zor>: doesnt work
05:16:21 PM: [From] <Zor>: nor does reload
05:16:25 PM: [From] <Zor>: relog works tho
05:16:30 PM: [To] <Zor>: sounds like blizzard's propblem then
05:16:38 PM: [From] <Zor>: yea, blame blizzardf
05:16:43 PM: [From] <Zor>: i see how it is
05:17:48 PM: [To] <Zor>: if a reload doesnt fix it and a logout does
05:17:53 PM: [To] <Zor>: then it is certainly blizzards problem
